Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace that was reconstructed at the time of its discovery. In the center a large spherical bead, made from a bright blue enamelled paste, is surrounded by disc-shaped beads from ostrich eggshell, then alternatively three groups of thick blue-green beads made from an enamelled paste and two groups of disc-shaped beads from ostrich eggshell. The blue pearls are identical to those of the Middle and Classical Kerma periods.
